values:
So I promised I would start updating more often and I feel proud of myself for doing that...

Friday night I went out with Hesling, I love her by the way, and we went to Twin Lake.  Her and I were good children, well she was anyways.  I was surprised to see some boys fighting in the dirt and some kids I havn't seen in a few weeks.  Of course the whole mocking Kaily about cabin weekend continued, and although I am getting tired of it, some of the things are funny.  Megan and I were getting bored so she went and got her country CD and we put it in Hoppe's car and Meg taught me some line dance moves...we are deffinetly going to have to go kick it some time........So Kendra, Staci, Miranda and Kayleigh decided they were going to camp out friday night and while they were gone we had a flood warning ( haha )  and Zillka placed their tent on Hoppe's roof...he was just looking out for the girls of course.   Meg and I decided to leave after our fun-filled evening....then I was awoken by my damn alarm Saturday morning about 7:30......Becky was on her way to get me, and we had this fun tubbing trip planned.

So we get to Jackie's about 8:35ish and must I state we were EARLY...and if anyone knows Becky she is NEVER early......Finally Cait and Goreschy showed up and we jumped in the cool ass truck.  We went and met Sharon and Jackie's mom then to get the tubes.....so we had to fill up our own tubes, well the lady told us the hose was outside, must I say all of us, that would be 7 people, walked around the building not to find the hose.  Thank god we got it all figured out and we were on our way.

Our tubbing trip was soo much fun and we all plan to do it again and SOON..everyone should go it was a blast...espically when Jackie got attacked by those trees.  I"m sorry, I saved your tube though hehe....I would just like to inform everyone I was the only person NOT to get burnt  and Sarah Goresch wins the medal for the most COLOR haah...shes got skill.  I LOVE all you girls and we are gunna hang out more !!

Later on we all needed a nap since we were so tired.  Then we all partied our way down to GH for the Coast Guard Festivle, fun times I must say...I also enjoyed meeting Goreschy's friend Stephaine and seeing Karl and Matt woah yeah haha....I must say we walked out hinney's off, but it was so much fun and seeing that couple get engaged on the pier...SO AWESOME

Last night was a long one, now just relaxing andI am excited to finally make my apt for my road test...EXCITING....I must also inform you all of my visit with Heather Harp at sam's today, fun times we had a nice little chat and I hope to see her this weekend!...oh and by the way practiced paralle (?) parking, I must say I am a NATURAL...I will talk to you all later.......byes!

SO I am truely sorry I havn't been updating it has been a busy time for me....I dont even know where to start..Since there is too much I will just supply you all with the past few days.....

So Monday had the Laguna beach Paryt good times, Krisite we truly missed you...oh and I am Jessica by the way if anyone has any question, let me know.....Tuesday went to GH with Goreschy, Jackie, Becky, Scott, Caitlin, and Chris...fun times ... Goresch Becky and I are now trend setters and got everyone to start the electric slide in the street....So I was dropped off and then when I got home I got soo sick...I have been sick since then by the way... Wednesday went to school to do some senate stuff, fun times and then went to the pool with Scott, Derek, Casey, and my sister...woah good times.....I really love it when boys try to do flips and tricks off the diving board, but threy can't!

Today woke up and had to go to school again....did more senate stuff and then afterwards went out to breakfast with my favorite person in the world, Mr. Billy Bailey....it was so nice him and I caught up and talked A LOT.....Then drove to Derek's house where we watched movies and did absolutely nothing haha....by the way Derek is my sister's boyfriend

Then it occured...I went to go and get lunch for Derek I since we were hungry...well I was pulling out of the BK drive through and it was clear I made sure, b/c I can't get into an accident and this car was going really slow nad the car behind him was getting PISSED, so of course as soon as I pulled into the lane he swings out nad starts to speed up, NOT KNOWING I was there and almost hit me...I was about to die..so I survived my first  "almost accident"........

Now I am just sitting at home, waiting for Kendra to call and trying to get ahold of Hesling...even though she is line dancin' haha.... feelsing a litle better, but not much.....

Oh yeah, got a job offer yesterday I am EXCITED....and taking my road test soon, even though I drive anyways haha.....now all I need is a date....I want a boy who is nice and funny, cute would be alright too!......anyone want to set me up on a date that would be ok...I need to get away from all the "BAD" guys I have been hooking up with....  get back to me    ;)

Well, I was told I need to update more in a weird way...right, Bily?...well, as most of you know we had our first track meet on thursday and I did ok, but i need to practice and do better..haha..Jim was there and so was Shawn they are tight! haha...OH and OMG  the new big new of ALL  Yesterday was State Solo and Esemble and I went all freaking out like I was going to suck and get like straight 3's..well, to my surprise I got STRAIGHT 1's!!!!  haha Look at that Lawton!.....Last night I went out with some people and we got, as Pat says, smammered...oh so funny!   but it was fun I havnt done that in a while...I think I even called him and said I dont know what   Can't wait to do that when you get home William..
Now I am just doing my Independent Reading Project assigned by Mrs. Stacey Shepard....Fun stuff and then its to my government project...I will update more often for all of you's who care lol...
            xoxo,  Kaily

well as most of you know I am in Las Vegas and I know I havn't wrote in here a long time, but hmm ok....well I was having so much fun here until I got my sweet news today..So I was gone on friday and I didn't get to see what choir I was in and Rachel informed me today that I am in singers....DAMN IT!! I am so mad! I work so hard and I get no where.  I know to some people its not a big deal, but to me it's a lot.  Well I am happy for some people who got in there, but what is it about "having to pass your exam to be in chamber" and then seeing people who gots c's and f's on their exams in there when I got an A...I dunno, I guess I just suck more then I knew.....
   Well, I got my prom shoes today that cheered me up for awhile..and if anyone has been to Vegas and can tell me where I can find some La Coste stuff could ya tell me?..I can't find it anywhere, and I have looked everywhere.....well, I can't wait to come home I really need some people right now....or maybe I could just stay here awhile and not come home at all?....Billy, I miss you so much I can't wait for you to get home so I can talk to you....I hope your guys' spring break is going good...love you,
                       Kaily

woah long time no see can we say....

I guess I really dont have much to talk about, its valentines day and I am sad and tired of wasting my time of guys who dont care and dont treat me well.   Adam keeps calling and I dont know what to do about him...parents are going to TC and my sister will be in FL so thinking of staying home as he said he was coming over to be with me, but I dont know if I should fall for his stuff anymore....I need to find a good guy..someone help!

I talked to Billy today oh man I love that kid ....Superbowl was so much fun drank with the parents, but they didnt know hmmm miss.K is secret about all that....havnt done much of anything, wow I lead a boring life...sad...passed out some valentines to friends today, even thought I boycotted Valentines day.....althought, yes Miles was my valentine and I did get like a 2 minute hug from him, its just not the same....

Other good news, I got a 1 at solo and ensamble so haha STATE HERE I COME!..going to see my grandparents over spring break in Las Vegas, YESS! I miss them so much I dont know I need them so bad right now, and sorry if I have been an ass to any of you, I am having a really hard time right now with my life and sorry to those I just cant talk about it yet...give me a little time and hopefully I will get everything worked out....

well, I must go and finish spending my valentines day alone hehe...oh well, what can ya do.....love you all,    kails

I know I havn't updated in a while, but I found this and it was fun so here we go....

DOB
Favourite Color

This cool quiz by Midnight_Sunrise - Taken 6054 Times.
New - Kwiz.Biz Astrology and Horoscopes
and I will update later on when I got time..xoxo Kails
Hey guys thought I would just share my FIRST KISS of the new year with you all!...woah too much fun at my birthday party I guess!  I love you KT

Yeah so new years eve was my birthday....I had a lot of fun with the peeps I was with and let me tell you kissing Katie sure started the year off GGGRREEAAATT!...I wish I would of had someone else, but she was good!   

I got a Flippin SWEET candle from Lyssa and I LVOE IT  and I love my blanky TOO  and for all of you who didnt get me a present I am waiting and you know what I want..well Erik doesnt need to get me one we talked haha  I LOVE YOU ....

So here is the other good news....On New Year's day we always go to our family friend's house ( John Palony..dont know how to spell )..well everyone always gets TRASHED and Derek and I usually chill and watch movies..  Well 3 of my days friends who are in their 20's are SOO CUTE and I have this crush on one of them...just a kiddy crush of course b/c he is 26, but...

>well, the day started off with all of us watching movies like N.D. and X-men and X-2 ect...fun fun ya know...well later on Jared got toasted and I took his spot playing poker..well he came back to play and I was standing up he SMACKED my ass...it hurt so bad but he did say sorry and hugged me!...

Then Chamblee was getting bad and he kept coming up to me going "you wanna make out"  kidding of course b/c they are ALL like that and Jared poped his nose in saying YES... well, he kept asking me why I dont have a boyfriend becasue i am cute and fun and blah blah, you know all the drunk talk.  So Amanda got out of work and she came into the movie room with Derek and I and then her and Derek started snuggleing...tear tear  I was sad...BUT Chamblee came to the rescue and he as he called it "sponed with me!" awe he made me feel a litle better

Well it started to be really late and he left to go and go to the bathroom I guess and then I went and played some hold 'em with my dad and some peeps and Chamblee came back and asked if I wanted to sit on his lap of course I had to say no My dad would KILL me..so 2:30 rolled around and my sister wanted to leave so since she wanted to go I had to and I feel bad becuse I left poor Jared, when I was suppose to drive him home..I AM SORRY!

Well, we began to leave, you know say our good byes, thank everyone get otta there...well I gave Chamblee a hug and he goes "hey Kaily, how about a kiss" and he started shaking his tounge around sorry I said no as MY DAD was watching ...well I kissed my dad good night nad said good bye to everyone with Chamblee still waiting nad begging for another hug..

So I gave him a hug and as he ask for a kiss on the cheek I go, whats the harm..I turned to give hmi one nad he TURNED and kissed my mouth...omg worst thing ever I know hes old, but he was drunk so he wont remember...

I swear that is my funniest story on new Year's Day EVER!....god my parents friends are sooo messed up...well, I guess you had to be there but I figured I would let you all know!...and to think Chamblee has a girlfriend in Egypt!  hmm mmmk!

P.S.~ once I get the chance I will be posting pictures from my birthday on here..so fun for all to see!

                    xoxo

well, its offical I NEEDD help....I would just like to say I never realized the friends I had and I just wanted to thank god for giving them to me while I may not be the greatest/nicest person ever I still need some help and I am glad that I have them...I loveyou all   Espically NICOLE and ANDREW!  thank you guys SOO much!

well sorry it's been forever!! since I have updated....I am a little tired so I am just gunna give you the skinny...

well I got my wisom teeth pulled.....couldn't eat for like a week and a half!  ouch it hurt but now I am fine and my stiches sucked coming out...Christmas was GREAT like always!

got some sweet clothes and some other fun stuff haha....

The past two days I have been hanign with  Steve from TC and it has been fun...for Christmas he got me a HUGE teddy bear!  awe cuteness and Brett's little brother (Chad) is now mine...

I am confused though there is this kid who I like a lot and I just dont know how its gunna work out or whats gunna happen or AARRGHHHH!! I need help..BECKY you know this one...well, I need to get going to bed i am tired and I have a TUMOR!...well, a ctually a swollen lymth note?..right I dunno how to spell it...oh yea and for all of you who DON'T KNOW!...

2 days until my BIRTHDAY!......oh wait it's....12:59...so

1 DAY!!!...good night all!

WOAH it has been a long time hasn't it?...

well, I guess I never really talk about the christmas dance, thast b/c there was TOO much fun  so the jist is...IT Was GGGRRREEEAATTT!

now for the other news...

Annie and I went to the Holiday Inn to figure out Prom stuff and I swear it is going to be sooo awesome...all you seniors scared, TRUST ME IT'LL ROCK!  hmm so next thing, my parents found out that branden and I were dating and that he was older, so there was A LOT of yelling and crying but I had to call him and tell him it was over.....mom has to use the phone so I will finish with anything new later....

OH YES....I am getting my wisdom teeth pulled  monday good luck for me please...and yes...

2 weeks until my birthday!!! 

                 love you all  xoxo Kaily

AWE I love teddy Bears!!!

Brandon you are the SWEETEST person EVER in the WORLD!, except for the fact you get me home later everytime.  I hope my mom doesn't shoot me!

 

Yeah so everyone, Branden and I went and hung out tongith and well, he is soo sweet he got me a teddy bear!  it si sooooo soft and he named it Theador!  awe teddy for short! 8 )...  well, I spent all day cleaning oh yea and Kaily has the CLEANEST mouth ever!  NO cavities and my teeth are now freshly cleaned but the only bad thing is I have to get my other wisdumb teeth pulled OUCH!

Oh yeah and Jenni and I went and brought Tom to BK  fun times, I love how the kids are sooo little oh yeah and that one kid "So tom these fine ladies are taking you to BK!"   hmmm, he was a little scary!  well, I need to go and rest up..LONG NIGHT!   xoxo luv Kails....

P.S.     HAPPY TURKEY DAY! * well, tomorrow anyways...gobble, gobble!

Hey Hey!

Yeah so x-mas dance is like in a week oh yeah and TREE  yes I love tree week espically how I am so tired the whole time!

 

Tongiht I had fun I went with Branden and we hung out we really don't do much we just hang out ya know?...hard to explaine..so yeah totally forgot that I had a boyfriend but now I remember, espically when I got home from the store and found out he called! AWE  it makes me feel so special and hmm teddy bear?! what branden?? haha

I am so excited we are hanging out tomorrow too and hmm maybe a presnet?..dunno, I guess I ruined the surprise!  I AM SOO SORRY, you can still give me my present anyways!

 

well, I have a fun DENTIST apt. tomorrow with my sis and then who knows what her and I will be up to  I LVOE HER!! oh yeah and 1/2 day  WOOT WOOT!!

well, I think I am off to bed or maybe to get a snack I AM HUNGRY!   haha   whoops, forgot I am becoming annorexic!  luv all,  xoxo's   kAiLs!

So I have come to the conclusions that this song was written about me!

Somewhere there's a stolen halo.
I used to watch her wear it well.
Everything would shine wherever she would go,
But looking at her now, you'd never tell.

Someone ran away with her innocence,
A memory she can't get out of her head.
And I can only imagine what she's feeling when she's praying,
Kneeling at the edge of her bed.

    And she says: "Take me away", and "Take, me Father."
    "Surround me, now, and hold, hold, hold me like holy water:
    Holy water.

She wants someone to call her "Angel";
Someone to put the light back in her eyes.
She's looking through the faces, and unfamiliar places.
She needs someone to hear her when she crys:

    And she says: "Take me away", and "Take me, Father."
    "Surround me, now, and hold, hold, hold me like holy water.

      She just needs a little help,
      To wash away the pain she's felt.
      She wants to feel the healing hands,
      Of someone who understands.

    And she says: "Take me away", and "Take me, Father."
    "Surround me, now, and hold, hold, hold me.

    She says: "Take me away ", and "Take me, Father."
    "Surround me, now, and hold, hold, hold me like holy water:
    "Like Holy water.
    "Like Holy water.
    "Like Holy water."

To Fade.

 

really sad right now, Branden asked me out cute stuff, but he was suppose to come over and hes not over here I am lonely and bored aarrgghh    EXCITED FOR THE DACNE THO! YEAH!

AWE and Billy is on but he is away and its sad b/c I miss him like my life and I want to talk to him so bad!  I LOVE YOU!   well I prolly should get going see what I can get done before bed!  xoxo kails

hmm yeah so Kaily is grounded?  yeah thats the news!   She is NEVER grounded, well it didn't last that long but what a few days and thank god just in time...we had a party saturday ngiht right guys? and gals?   fun times, umm pretty  sure that NUN needs to chill it and I never want to see it again...so freaky, right Jen?  I am so sorry Branden, but the beard is sooo scary, please can we try without it just for a lil, and then you can grow it back I PROMISE!

School is pretty awesome espically since I got so much homework tongith that I should be doing, but oh well I guess I just dont care anymore.  OMG I got an e-mail from Billy I miss that kid like its my job...he is like a brother to me and i cant wait till he gets back!

yeah so other upset, ummm I was suppose to babysit tongiht, you all know Ty Switzer?, well I was babysitting his brother and sister best little kids ever!   Well his dad calls me like 30 minutes before I have to go and babysit and tells me he doesnt need me..cool I changed my plans and lost money NOOO tear tear  saddness  THANKS TY!   Well, I must go off and start some homework oh yeah and x-mas dance?!  ehhhhh!  what to do

DATES?!  anyone, since becky ditched me and found a date so I can't go with her now!

so last night yes fun and no fun...we had tree rehersal after school and then after that we were a little hungry so we went and got chinese, well not before we went to Pic n Pac and I drove Jen and Lena to Jen's  fun fun fun...

here is where the excitement begins!...

Lysaa needed gas so she pulled into the spot and hit the black pole and scratched her car up! ouch! haha  then to top it off she locked her keys in her car! YEES!!  we went and got her spare keys then ended up getting chinese..how good!

After chinese we went to the mall to find exciting things to do, and then the night grew short and it was time for everyone to get home, so Jen and I were pulling out of the parking spot and Jen HIT a CAR! OMg....from all that fun Jen and Pete came over and we all just chilled where I forgot about the noddles I was making for my mom for chicken noddle soup.

But in turn they were fine and I guess the soup was good too!
          Now TODAY!....

LONGEST DAY OF MY LIFE!!!!

Becky and I walked to BK and got a little bite to eat before the fun solo auditions today....then with about 45 mintues til we walked back to the high school, as neither of us have ours licenses, and hung out with some peeps before auditions.....THEN THEY STARTED...

    The nerve racking experience started with Siahumba??...who knows how to spell that and for Becky and I ended with True Light....by the way LOGAN ROCKED MY WORLD IN THAT SONG!!....and today I found out Becky has one of the goregous voices ever...I LOVE YOU GIRLIE!!.... I have been hanging out at home kind of cold and crampish.  I went and got my passport pictures taken and I am SOOO READY FOR BRAZIL, right guys?!  YES!      I have been trying to call Branden to talk but he is cool and isin't at home...tear, tear..

oh and before I go and let you little kiddies go off to bed, I have one fun thing to say.....Today in English class I played Mrs. Hepherd and I was pregnant...oh yes and can't forget about Sarah playing Mr. Flash!  who doesn't like checking out men and who likes to talk about cocks....need info please just ask!
    well I will see all you kiddies bright and early as there is no sleep in     SADNESS!!     ~xoxo  Kails~

woah what a weekend....I just have to say saturday night I had SOOOooOO much fun!  ummm...pretty sure we need to do that again guys..that is like the most fun I have had in like 2 months!...well I went on a dte saturday and hmmm went ok not bad...and I have been driving everywhere I swear I have like 1- hours in already HECK YEAH  I know go Kaily!!

I feel kind of bad tho, b/c the kid I went to the movies with called me saturday night and I didn't call him back but ehh I was having so much fun I dunno....he'll prolly call tonight again..

OMG I almost forgot OC Thursday Oh Yeah!  My sis and I went to Derek's house and I met Ted and Mike and Dave...him just like to say that Dave is the hottest person I have ever met and every girl needs to see him once in his life.  I believe he is a metro-sexual tho he gets manacures...hmmm kinda cute tho  but hes gorgeous too bad hes got a girl ,but him and Mike both said I was cute for my age since they both are older...and sadly Dave has a girlfriend, but he gave me hugs all night.  I cant wait i think we are going to do this again thursday night at Derek's hmmm unless I find something else better to do....well I gotta go and read for class....talk to you all later...oh and thanks lyss for the comment  I mean Vindecated by DC!!!! LOVE IT FOREVER   but I still want to Something Corperate CD  god stuff   

good night and sweet dreams!

hey ladies and gents!

I am so excited Lyss and me and all fun and stuff and everything in the world is going great, well except I am dizzy and have a HUGE headache STILL!!!......

Well I will tell you all the fun newa, I have been talking to this kid I met like 3 weeks ago, he goes to muskegon and he is such a sweetheart and is so funny!....Well today we played phone tag all night, and I finaly got to talk to him after he got out of church.  Well we were discussing relationships and who we have dated ect. and well I was getting off the phone and he goes.."Kaily I really like you.  you are funny and sweet and I can't wait to hang out with you and see what happens!"  he made my night I am so excited, we are going on our "first date"  this saturday and I am a little nervous...so if anyone wants to come with me?....wonderful!  plz get back to me..oh yeah and I want a copy of Vindicated by Somthing Corperate..if anyone can hook me up PLEASE!!! I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THAT SONG!!!

good night and sweet dreams,  kaily!

woah let me tell you I am about fed up with everything....

Lyss Rach and I went to Kay's house saturday night, I didnt really want to but I didnt want to stay home so why not right?...it wasn't that bad I just cant be around her and Brett anymore, its as if we all dont get along....with, understandable, there are some things you gotta find a way to work out...

So my phone has been acting all weird all weekend and when Lyss dropped me off saturday night my mom called like 9 times and everytime I picked up the phone no one was there...she said it was busy..nope...well its been doing thie constently and I am tired of it...Lyss and Rach said their phone has been doing it too..fun stuff

So yesterday was Halloween and everyone had this huge plan of doing stuff ya know going to the haunt, or even just going trick or treating...well again I got shafted...I am getting tired of it, you know how bad it makes you feel when your FRIENDS blow you off not just once like a lot...I mean ya know one time, maybe two thats alrigth but when you get to get high up there it hurts, I mean they are your friends right?...so I guess moving to another school is a good thing, obviously no one would care....and then to brag and talk about how much fun you had that makes a person feel even better..

well I need to go and do a paper for english....

woah ok let me tell you what a fun time my life is!

I hate living at home everyone is always yelling at each other and pissed off and no one is happy.  I hate it!  I am medically depressed, I try to come to school hapy and show like I am happy but it isint workin anymore and I feel bad bc I am mean to people when i dont mean to be and it just happens...sorry to those who I am mean too

There is this kid in my Driver's training class, oh yeah that has taken over my life the past 3 weeks I get my permit on thursday tho!  Thank god, and he has a crush on me he goes to muskeong nad I love the kid he is so funny and damn he cracks me up  that was the thing that kept me sane....I will miss him thank god we are trading numbers then I can just call him up. 

I hate how everything at school is so political, ok maybe I do suck at singing and I am just too stubborn to realize it, but pretty cool for lawton to say that allegros is amazing and pretty much saying that if you didnt make it you suck and your not amazing nad everyone flaunting it in 2nd hour YEAH go Kails for not making it mabe next year, as everyone says.. when I have gotten call backs every year and still nothing has changed

I have been talking to my mom about leaving shores I get so depressed when I go to schol and I dont know if leaving will help, I dont know where I would go maybe muskegon or catholic (SICK!) but we still need to finish our conversation.  I am just fed up with everything/ everyone I dont really want to get into it right now.  Well I am feeling sick again and I might have the same problem my mom had b/c my stomach is acting the same way and it hurts and its scary!  

I have been keeping myself busy with some fun people tho like Derek I had a nice long conversation with him saturady night and if felt so good to talk to someone, I miss him so much I am sad I dont see him as much anymore I told him we had to work on that and we are going to try and see each other every week/weekend!  I LOVE him he is my favorite brother!  

Well Amanda needs the computer and I need some sleep so I will talk to you all later and if you have any advice please give it to me straight I can take it, hopefully!

woah  its been a while huh?..so much to update here but who knows if I really have the time...well we can try it and see what happenes

My grand parents from Vegas were here for about a week b/c sadly my great grandpa died and it was sooo SAD! I miss him...he had been realyl sick so hes in a better place..The time they were here went by so fast b/c everything was funeral stuff!   igot a new bedspread..ya'll have to see it soo cute!...but I have been sick for about 2-3 weeks and I cant get over it I was realyl sick fro his funeral and couldnt ever talk and I had to sing and man I sucked it up even though everyone said ti was fine i knew NOPE! 

The albanian guys are officailly gone...I broke up with Gazmen oh yeah, I was dating him, and my sister let Ruzhdi go after me so they thought she was copying me but who cares...I have been flying solo...I have been soo budy with SCHOOL, DRIVER'S TRAINING!9 that is the stupidest class I have ever taken in my life and I am so glad this is the last week, if I had to be in it for more then 3 weeks I would prolly die!)

Last night I had so much fun I was with jessica from muskegon I lOVE that girl to death I am so glad her and I are hanging out so much more now I miss everyone from Muskegon, I want to go back, I mean I love Shores peeps but I miss my old friends and it kills me.  So we went to Pizza Hut for dinner b/c we wanted pizza and we had no money..while we were there I met thie guy she works with, his name is Tim and he totally was flirting SO bad with me!  it was funny shizz....He gave me his number and told me to call him...hmm we'll see!

After pizza hut we went to her house and watch Haunted Mantion?..dunno some kid movie that was SCARy should be rated R haha...(we are such losers for staying home but oh, well..what can ya do?)  Then her sister came home and my sister was with her..so we got thie good idea and dressed up Jessica in the halloween costume, it looked like the tooth fairy from Darkness Falls...so freaky!  My sister was about ready to attack her and kick some ass!

Well that was so fun we tried doing ti to Jared when he came over but he was gay and wouldn't turn the right way so we couldn't scare him  butt head!....well the funniest thing was that on her way to scare him Jessica triped and feel flat on her face so funny and no one helped her!   Then we watched Ella Enchanted good cute movie...and partied it up all night and then went to bed...man good times with Jessica....Well I really need to go and fiish a paper for AP Lang....if anyone knows where anyone is hiring PLEASE FILL ME IN!  I need a job like its my life!  I have turned in liek 20 applications and yeah hopefully a call soon....

I also need an idea for a halloween costume?..hmm anyone want to make some PEEPS ya know group thang?..something fun yeah lets go!  well I'm outie   I will be updating hopefully regulary now....love Kaily

WOAH!   
  Just to fill you all in I have been without a computer ALL SUMMER, not like I needed it anyways but yeah.  So we just got a brand new one thats sooooo SEXY!

   So my sister hooked up with this guy from G.R. who is one of the nicest people I have met in my life! Her and I went to G.R. to see a movie and he introduced me to his frined Veli (pronounced Valley) and he is the funniest person I have ever met.  well him and I hooked up kinda we kissed, and the funny thing was he bit my lip and it started bleeding but that was the second time I saw him.  See we and my firend Jessica went back to G.R. as Veli's parents were out of town and we had a fun party as his house.  Nothing bad of course I PROMISE!  Well, Veli and I like being friends better then anything else, which is for the best and his friend Rigo liked me a lot, so all the guys got us talking and hanging out and we have been hanging out forever now.

   He is from Armenia and is a sweetie.  He got me by telling me I have pretty eyes in Armenian.  Last weekend he took me out to dinner and we watched movies and I got to meet his best friend and hisbest friend's girlfriend.  You all can see pictures of him and all the guys once I get them developed.  I know you all are excited!  I am seeing him tomorrow too I am excited, he is coming to Muskegon and some of you might be able to meet him actualy!

  There prolly is more stuff but the boys from Albania and Armenia are the highlight of my summer!  I am going to go now and get chinese food with my sister and wrap presents for my moms birthday  (september 5th!) 

     Love you all,     Kaily!

Let's just say I have tried to change my ways, but I have to stick tothem, its what makes me, me!  and I love corrupting people (wink, wink)  I was going to take Tom on a little BK run with me but when I called to talk to James, he wasn't home so poor Tom coudln't come! so today I had my wonderful doctor's apt. with my hemotoligist..blood doctor.  I had to get all this blood drawn and then on top of it take this medication that makes me SICK     I am still sck right now and I hate feeling like this.  I totaly realized tongith that my life is changing and I can't change anything!  I don't know what I am going to do and I need a lot of help...Billy is leaving in like 1 month and he is like a brother I wont see him for a year and NOOO I dont know what I will do.  Robert is going off to college, he has been the person who I can count on cheering me up, and I wont have that soon..and in a year my sister will be gone.. I don't have that much time with her....a few friends couldn't tell me the truth and that hurts the most.....Friends are suppose to be there for you when things go wrong, not make things go wrong I just don't want to sounds jealous, so I will keep it to myself.  My parents wont stop fighting nad I need to get out of this place I need to escape maybe leave for a little while, that would work and sadly, one more thing a person who ithought was totaly out of my life just stepped back into it.  I thought I would be fine with it, but I am not...he means too much to me to just sit here and let him pass me by...he could be the one I need to make me happy, he always made me happy and I want to go back to that again....I will sleep on it and please someone help me I don't know what to do!  sweet dreams, Kaily
